25. $\cfrac{(x^2-9)(y+x-1)}{x-3}=0\Leftrightarrow\cfrac{(x-3)(x+3)(y+x-1)}{x-3}=0\Leftrightarrow
\begin{cases}\left[\begin{array}{l}x=-3,\\ y=1-x.\end{array}\right.\\ x\neq3\end{cases}$
$$% TIKZ_ID{task025-solution-fig1}
